Name: The CLASSLA-Stanza model for lemmatisation of standard Bulgarian 2.1
Description: The model for lemmatisation of standard Bulgarian was built with the CLASSLA-Stanza tool by training on the BulTreeBank training corpus and using the Bulgarian inflectional lexicon (Popov, Simov, and Vidinska 1998). The estimated F1 of the lemma annotations is ~98.93. The model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.
